job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: <p>Required Skills:</p><p>1. Developer role, ML Model implementation, experimentation &amp; related software engineering focused</p><p>2. Experience as a data scientist with a preference in forecasting algorithms</p><p>3. Python, PySpark&nbsp;development experience a must</p><ul><li>1-2 years of software development experience </li><li>1-2 years of experience as a data scientist with a preference in forecasting algorithms</li><li>BS or MS degree is Software Engineering or Computer Science</li><li>Ability to learn fast and handle multiple priorities</li><li>Developer role, ML Model implementation, experimentation &amp; related software engineering focused</li></ul>
